RelatedSentence: KINGSTON , Jamaica -- Students from 350 primary schools across the island will on Tuesday , May 20 participate in the 21 st Butterkist National Primary School 's Mathematics Competition at 22 centres .
Last year Emile Bain of Mona Heights Primary School emerged the national champion with a score of 97 per cent .

RelatedSentence: The competition , which was first held in 1992 , seeks to promote excellence in mathematics at the primary level .

Butterkist will recognise and reward the national champion , the 14 parish champions , and their teachers at a special awards ceremony on June 20 , 2014 at the Knutsford Court Hotel in Kingston .
